function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Financial impact due to economic deterioration and project suspensions","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of international cooperation in responding to contagious diseases","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misconception that climate change is a distant threat and less urgent than immediate crises.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underemphasis of the impacts of climate change on public health in public debates.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased deaths in developing countries","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Long-term acceptance of lockdown measures due to temporary nature","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of climate change as a crisis with temporary solutions","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in national responses to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission through shared mobile interface and web platform","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multi-source data access increases the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety measures are not in place.","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mobile interface and qr code scanning for building occupants may pose a risk of viral transmission if hygiene practices are not followed.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time ieq data assessment through the mobile interface creates an environment for potential virus exposure among the occupants if proper sanitization measures are not in place.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Co-location of ibem devices with reference sensors in an office environment may lead to potential contamination and spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene and cleaning protocols are not followed.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of scientific and simplified deployment scheme for ibem","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Automatic linkage of ibem with environmental control system","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transformation of ibem deployment methodology from experience-based model to data-driven model","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of the ibem hardware instrument with contagious pathogens or microbes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data security for the extensive ieq database","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or misleading ieq data collection and transmission","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on actual energy performance of buildings","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of structured information leading to inefficiency in data analysis and management","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited impact of lockdown measures on energy use by systems","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of basal eui","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of safety protocols for in-situ visits to buildings during the pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measured energy consumption of refrigerators","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due to climate conditions","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disregard of climate change by building stakeholders","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resilience against future shocks","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"International travel contributing to the spread of Covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of global spread due to air travel","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through aerosol acknowledged by WHO","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to self-isolation and quarantine measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Initial approach towards social distancing and self-isolation may not have been sufficient to prevent a high death count","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High number of overseas arrivals during lockdown may have contributed to the spread of the virus","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to increased transmission of Covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear transmission routes and factors for Covid-19","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of policy focus on urban context for covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of personal protective equipment and professional training for family members leading to familial cluster infections.","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human exposure to raccoon feces contaminated with baylisascaris procyonis eggs","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for baylisascariasis","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information about survival of b. procyonis eggs and disinfection techniques","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to poor air quality and potential disease spread.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with ashrae guidelines for building operations during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal access to housing exacerbates public health crisis","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of scrutiny on the relationship between housing, health, and social inequality","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of housing as a determinant of health inequality without sustained scrutiny","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The covid-19 pandemic exacerbating social inequality, housing insecurity, and health disparities","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Home as a locus of social harm during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient regulation of harm in housing policy discourses","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex and recursive relationship between social inequality, housing, and health","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"}]}
